00023         public MainTablePane(

00026

00030 
00031 //            columnNames[0] = resourceMap.getString("ColRound");
00032   //          columnNames[1] = resourceMap.getString("ColHome");
00033     //        columnNames[2] = resourceMap.getString("ColAway");
00034             Object[][] data = {{"aaa", "bbb", "ccc"}, {"111", "222", "333"}, {"xxx", "yyy", "zzz"}};
00035 
00036             javax.swing.JPanel panel = new javax.swing.JPanel();
00037             javax.swing.JPanel buttonPanel = new javax.swing.JPanel();
00038 
00039             mainTable = new JTable(data, columnNames);
00040             initTable();
00041             mainTable.setFillsViewportHeight(true);
00042             JScrollPane scrollPanel = new JScrollPane(mainTable);
00043 
00044             panel.setLayout(new BoxLayout(panel, BoxLayout.X_AXIS));
00045             buttonPanel.setLayout(new BoxLayout(buttonPanel, BoxLayout.Y_AXIS));
00046 
00047             upButton.setAction(actionMap.get("moveUp"));
00048             upButton.setText(resourceMap.getString("upButton.text"));
00049             upButton.setName("upButton");
00050 
00051             downButton.setAction(actionMap.get("moveDown"));
00052             downButton.setText(resourceMap.getString("downButton.text"));
00053             downButton.setName("downButton");
00054 
00055             saveButton.setAction(actionMap.get("save")); // NOI18N
00056             saveButton.setText(resourceMap.getString("saveButton.text"));
00057             saveButton.setName("saveButton");
00058 
00059             buttonPanel.add(upButton);
00060             buttonPanel.add(downButton);
00061             buttonPanel.add(saveButton);
00062 
00063             panel.add(scrollPanel);
00064             panel.add(buttonPanel, BorderLayout.NORTH);
00065 
00066             add(panel);
00067             setName("tablePane");
00068             setViewportView(panel);
00069         }

00071         private void initTable() {
00072             javax.swing.table.TableColumn column = null;
00073 
00074             mainTable.setSelectionMode(ListSelectionModel.SINGLE_SELECTION);
00075             mainTable.setColumnSelectionAllowed(false);
00076             mainTable.setRowSelectionAllowed(true);
00077 
00078             mainTable.getColumnModel().getColumn(0).setPreferredWidth(10);
00079             mainTable.getColumnModel().getColumn(1).setPreferredWidth(100);
00080             mainTable.getColumnModel().getColumn(2).setPreferredWidth(100);
00081         }
